header.title: XML Validation
header.meta: XPontus XML Editor features - XML Validation

section.title: Single file validation
section.p: You have to open the file you want to validate and use the menu Tools->Validate XML

section.title: XML Batch validation
section.p: You can validate a batch of XML files(and or directories) using XML Batch Validation.
The menu is Tools->XML Batch Validation.
By default, the Batch Validation will be performed on file which filenames end by ".xml". You can choose to add or remove file patterns(*.svg,*.xsl,etc.)
If the option Look into sub-directories is selected, all the subdirectories will be scanned according to the XML patterns(file extensions) you specified.
